website_summaries.verdict: The Dell UltraSharp UP2715K is an expensive 27-inch monitor that delivers a beautiful 5K picture along with a robust feature set.

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for Mac Book Pro
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my Apple cinema as I am a Graphic Designer. Great colour, sharp text etc. Anti glare works great! Great for those in need of a monitor with TRUE colour for print, video editing, photography, graphics etc. Apple no longer make monitors but here is an excellent replacement from Dell!
customer_reviews.author: RTB

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent monitor. It works like a charm with the 2015 Macbook Pro. Please make sure to use the Thunderbolt to DisplayPort cable included to get 4K resolution at 60hz (hdmi supports only 30 herz) Similarly, don't forget to connect the monitor via USB to the computer in order to use the usb ports on the back of the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best 4K monitor for a price!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases in the last couple of months! Love the screen and the resolution! Monitor is fully adjustable in all directions, got perfect colours with a bit of a adjustments. Amazing for day to day office work, photography and video edits, gaming and movie watching. Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: TomB

customer_reviews.title: I also find that writing documents is easier as you can display multiple pages and find your way around your document more easil
customer_reviews.text: This goes well with my Allienware laptop. Graphics and CAD programs in particular, benefit from the extra acreage. I also find that writing documents is easier as you can display multiple pages and find your way around your document more easily. The display itself is excellent at the higher resolutions and is greatly suited to video and photo editing.
customer_reviews.author: BeeVee

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with quality
customer_reviews.text: Just utterly irritated. I have two of these. One from 2015 and another from 2018. The older one has started to break down with random mostly green snow. Not sure what to do about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really decent 4K monitor.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not going to win a design award, but performance wise it’s hard to criticise. Great basic 4K screen.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Took a while for me to review this. Probably have a newer model. An ideal 4K monitor with very accurate colours, especially for someone like me that does a lot of photo editing. Good contrast. brightness and black values. USB sockets are a useful feature. Fully adjustable rotation is all directions. A class monitor. Highly recommend especially for professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. I. George

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: The colour resolution and resolution are outstanding, with a great combination to a 4K Laptop. I happy with the high cost because of the performance and impact of extended use of the laptop & screen combo
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Venter

customer_reviews.title: the clarity and richness of colours is great. to set it up is no problem but ...
customer_reviews.text: cant say enough about this 4k monitor,is as described in the ad.im shooting and editing 4k video from my drone and when played back on this new monitor its out of this world,the clarity and richness of colours is great. to set it up is no problem but you need a DP cable from your PC to the monitor in order for it to refresh at 60 hertz as instead of 30 hertz to get real 4k quality.it came 2 days early and was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: mr w skelton

customer_reviews.title: Great 4K Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Amazing display for the price. Running at full resolution is brilliant. At first everything was way too small but I've gotten used to it over time and can't imagine going back. Can't get over how light the unit is.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Glorious 4K. Superb.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this screen. No issues whatsoever. No back light bleed and no connectivity issue. I am on revision 03, manufactured Nov 2015. 4k in 27 inch on Windows 10 and Kubuntu 14.04 is nothing but spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: chrisg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for photo editing.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. I use it for photo editing, once it was calibrated the colours, sharpness and clarity are everything you need. Would buy again, but hopefully won't have to for quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Edward Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great quality panel
customer_reviews.text: Great quality panel, as I expect from Dell. Crisp, great colours, uniform brightness, great connectivity. Been using Dell monitors for many years now and have never been let down.
customer_reviews.author: Keir

customer_reviews.title: The Display is really good. If you want to use it with a ...
customer_reviews.text: The Display is really good. If you want to use it with a macbook pro 2016/2017 you need a cable like this, Plugable USB-C to DisplayPort Adapter Cable (6'/1.8m) for 2016 / 2017 MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.author: Fran Mendez

customer_reviews.title: What to say? UHD-4K retina graphics in a monitor ...
customer_reviews.text: What to say? UHD-4K retina graphics in a monitor that I can rotate to portrait... it's the dream of a software developer.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Borges

customer_reviews.title: Stunning image, user friendly controls.
customer_reviews.text: IPS display, LED back light & 4K resolution make this a great monitor for the serious user looking for accurate colour rendition and a masive resolution. Not the most stunning design but the controls are easy and lest face it, who will be looking at the case when the display is so good?
customer_reviews.author: Paul E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for a developer
customer_reviews.text: Its pricey but worth it IMHO. The screen is very sharp and works great with my macbook pro. As a developer screen it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: R Clarke

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: Yup 5 stars. I'm impressed by both the picture and build quality. It isn't a glossy screen like the Apple Retina which means there are no reflections to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is sharper, brighter and cleaner looking than my late 2016 retina MacBook pro!
customer_reviews.author: Keith P.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Awesome monitor
customer_reviews.text: Performs very well. Great buy. Awesome monitor. Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Wale Adeyeye

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant. Crisp and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Crisp and beautiful. Fantastic at 4k resolution and also at lower resolutions. Using for work and a bit of gaming. Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Colinmw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent excellent excellent. Beware, will test your eyes to the limit reading text at native resolution ;)
customer_reviews.author: S. GILL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow 4k really makes a huge difference. A lot less scrolling! Looking at photos is also very good
customer_reviews.author: Rajiv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best (for now) 4K monitor - nice colors, quality crafted
customer_reviews.author: a reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: Worked straight from the box. Superb image quality. Colours are vibrant without being "in your face".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a very premium warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Beware of the so called Dell premium panel guarantee. The backlight on mine failed after 6 months. .It was replaced by a secondhand refurbished display in an unmarked box. (they only replace with new up to 14 days from purchase)
customer_reviews.author: MR RTP CARRUTHERS

customer_reviews.title: 32" was better for me.
customer_reviews.text: Great product really pleased except was too small so I had to scale up to 200%!!! Bought the same model in 32" and it is a better real-world balance of fineness versus readable size!
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: So you ask well what the picture like 100% +++ 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Only took 4hrs to set up with 4 cables!! as every computer has different out puts. I found my wireless mouse made the monitor go to power save after 3-4minutes reverted to cable mouse ok! So you ask well what the picture like 100% +++ 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: phil Samuel Boundy

customer_reviews.title: Great - but make sure your video card can cope with it!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent monitor - but not suitable for laptops with 1080p graphics cards. I replaced it with a 2k screen which works fine.
customer_reviews.author: DrNick

customer_reviews.title: Great second monitor for my son's gaming pc
customer_reviews.text: Great second monitor for my son's gaming pc, no problems linking it up. Very good picture. definitely recommend it, only problem is he wants another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturers get your quality control act together on LCD monitors or continue to get them all returned
customer_reviews.text: Vertical thin green line appeared on the screen after a few weeks. Appears this is a design fault as lot of similar descriptions on line. I am not messing around with repair and return on a £620 full retail price new monitor. Design or quality control, neither are acceptable. I did not keep the box beyond 2 weeks as it was the size of a small coffee table and I live in London. I lose the £30 on postage which I paid to get it here and nearly 1/2 day doing a nightmare makeshift packing and fighting my corner with returns. Very unhappy customer. If I could give it a zero I would.
customer_reviews.author: D SLATER

customer_reviews.title: Massive bezel..
customer_reviews.text: Has a bezel like a bumper boat... no recommended if you are buying more than one
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, however there is a known issue with ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, however there is a known issue with this model using the DisplayPort connections. It has trouble getting the monitor to be recognised by the computer. Solution seems to be to restart the computer with the monitor plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: This display is amazing setup with my macbook
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mainly for photo editing on a Macbook 13" retina 2015. It took me about 4 months to finally decide on this model after doing lots and lots of research online. This display is amazing setup with my macbook. Everything looks as sharp and as detailed as it is on the retina display. Lightroom works perfectly and 4k video streaming is fantastic. If you're thinking of a 4k monitor this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: GSinC

customer_reviews.title: It broke within 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May 2018, to use with my 2015 MacBook Pro. For a day and a half, it worked perfectly. The image quality is just as good as the 5 star reviews said. I was extremely happy with it. Then, it developed a serious fault: With a thin line going from the top to the bottom of the display (see photo). The fault was there even when the monitor wasn't connected to an input source. I discovered that faults like this are not 'that' uncommon for this particular make and model. I got a refund and decided to to buy another one. The build quality isn't great and I'm opting for a better make and model next time.
customer_reviews.author: James Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Almost excellent, but one major shortcoming
customer_reviews.text: As a monitor, it's good: sharp, clear, easy to read. However, it's the most frustrating piece of kit on my desk by a country mile. When my laptop screen saver kicks in, the monitor loses its connection and the screen goes blank. You can't wake it up with the mouse or keyboard. You can't switch it off using its own front panel switch. All you can do is to unplug it at the mains and start it up again. As you can imagine, this is unbelievably frustrating. My old (24") Dell monitor worked perfectly, so why doesn't this one? I won't be buying another Dell monitor; my blood pressure can't take it.
customer_reviews.author: saltire1954

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 12 months!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within 3 days of warranty! Nice screen until then. Build quality is very average.
customer_reviews.author: David Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Awful in practice
customer_reviews.text: DisplayPort inputs have broken down and don't work to spec anyway-- trying to get a warranty replacement is difficult. Better, compliant monitors are available. Don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Nimish

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better
customer_reviews.text: good monitor but ... 4k only via DP so forget Xbox 4k gaming smooth experience. I own it for about 9 months now and my feelings are severely confused ( like when you see your mother in law, in your new car, falling off the cliff). The black is rather grey, there is an "white light frame" around if you test it, view angle hugely loses quality of the picture as also colours experience. If your switch to 1080p , it's just a massacre. Build quality as always dell, one of the top. Two stars only for lack of 4k HDMI
customer_reviews.author: Dany

product_meta.title: Dell P2715Q 27-Inch Ultra HD 4K LCD Monitor (2M:1, 350 cd/m2, 3840 x 2160, 9ms, DP/Mini DP/HDMI, MHL/USB) - Black

Dell P2715Q 27-Inch Ultra HD 4K LCD Monitor (2M:1, 350 cd/m2, 3840 x 2160, 9ms, DP/Mini DP/HDMI, MHL/USB) - BlackVESA-compatible 100mm x 100mm

BOX CONTAINS

Cable Cover
User Documentation/Media
feature_bullets: Clear screen. Voltage Required AC 120/230 V

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars148 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
